data.persona: I live in a large city, but I am leaving it behind.  There is too much noise in this city and I can't take it any more.  I seek to live in the peaceful and more quiet countryside.
data.description:
You are in the scenic overlook.
This lovely clearing overlooks the great mountain range. It is covered in wildflowers of all different colors. There are stone benches where one can sit.
There's a grass, a boulders, a wildflower, and a bench here.
The old homeless man is here.

You are carrying a backpack, wearing a hats, a hiking boots, a long sleeved shirt, and a boot, and wielding an tattered map.

data.short_motivation: I want to settle here for a short while
data.mid_motivation: I want to get some rest before I continue with my journey
data.long_motivation: I want to travel to the countryside to live a peaceful and quiet life
